data.lyric:
[ti:Bad Energy (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:Legends Never Die (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Bad Energy (Explicit) - Juice WRLD
[00:02.22]Lyrics by：Blake Slatkin/David Biral/Denzel Baptiste/Jarad Higgins
[00:04.45]Composed by：Blake Slatkin/David Biral/Denzel Baptiste/Jarad Higgins
[00:06.68]Juice WRLD/Nessly：
[00:07.12]Uh uh uh-uh uh-uh uh uh
[00:12.80]Daytrip took it to ten hey
[00:14.08]Swallow all these pills with my pride
[00:16.35]Uh
[00:16.78]Married to my highs you may kiss the bride
[00:20.33]Trouble in my brain see it in my eyes
[00:23.24]I got voices in my head they keep me up at night
[00:26.66]Said I was okay but I'm lying feel like that I'm dying
[00:30.67]Soul screaming and crying feel my brain frying
[00:34.12]Tryna numb the pain all the d**gs I've been buying
[00:37.35]This oxy gettin' pricey pour the codeine in the Hi-C
[00:41.05]Blood red bling in the high seat
[00:42.89]I've been doing so much wrong
[00:44.01]Even though ma' told me to do the right thing
[00:46.23]Poppin' pills all night long in the studio pourin' out my feelings
[00:49.70]Can't explain this feeling
[00:51.62]Kinda feels like I'm losing even though I'm winning
[00:56.85]Drain out bad energy
[01:00.31]Drain out bad energy
[01:03.69]Forget the bad memories
[01:07.21]Forget the bad memories
[01:10.64]Drain out bad energy
[01:14.15]Drain out bad energy
[01:17.60]Forget the bad memories
[01:21.21]Forget the bad memories ayy ayy
[01:24.71]Multi-million dollars
[01:28.16]All mine from the start
[01:31.52]Codeine kills the drama
[01:35.39]And the trauma in my heart
[01:37.98]Just got a call from the dark side
[01:39.28]Stab wounds in my chest but I'm alright
[01:40.98]I miss my friends I hate this spotlight
[01:42.79]I love my girl I hate the thot life
[01:44.55]Yellow diamonds shiny pearls
[01:46.31]I'm tryna give her the world
[01:47.99]I'm tryna show her the world
[01:49.73]She ain't no ordinary girl
[01:51.96]I know she know I know she know I'm down and out
[01:55.22]Life is a ocean demons I've been drownin' out
[01:58.77]I watch the crowd and crack a smile
[02:02.26]I have a job to lead them out
[02:06.35]Drain out bad energy
[02:09.83]Drain out bad energy
[02:13.31]Forget the bad memories
[02:16.81]Forget the bad memories
[02:20.32]Drain out bad energy
[02:23.69]Drain out bad energy
[02:27.16]Forget the bad memories
[02:30.89]Forget the bad memories
[02:35.05]Juice WRLD/Nessly：
[02:47.23]Oh oh
[02:48.94]Daytrip took it to ten hey
[02:51.60]Oh-oh
[02:54.20]Oh oh oh-oh oh-oh
data.trans:
[ti:Bad Energy (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:Legends Never Die (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.22]//
[00:04.45]//
[00:06.68]//
[00:07.12]//
[00:12.80]Take a Daytrip制作
[00:14.08]我和着骄傲 吞下药片
[00:16.35]//
[00:16.78]迎娶我的此生挚爱 你可以亲吻新娘
[00:20.33]你从我的眼神里看出我心烦意乱
[00:23.24]我脑海里的声音让我夜不能寐
[00:26.66]我说我没事 可我在骗人 我感觉我命悬一线
[00:30.67]灵魂歇斯底里地尖叫呐喊 我感觉头痛欲裂
[00:34.12]我试图麻痹痛苦 我一直购买各种**
[00:37.35]这些药片让我嗨到不能自已 为自己倒满那种饮料
[00:41.05]我坐在高高的座位上 猩红的珠宝熠熠生辉
[00:42.89]尽管妈妈教导我约束自己的行为
[00:44.01]可我还是做了很多错事
[00:46.23]彻夜放纵自己 在工作室里发泄自己的情绪
[00:49.70]我无法解释这种感觉
[00:51.62]即使我大获全胜 我也觉得自己输得一败涂地
[00:56.85]排解忧愁 摆脱负能量
[01:00.31]排解忧愁 摆脱负能量
[01:03.69]将痛苦的记忆忘得一干二净
[01:07.21]将痛苦的记忆忘得一干二净
[01:10.64]排解忧愁 摆脱负能量
[01:14.15]排解忧愁 摆脱负能量
[01:17.60]将痛苦的记忆忘得一干二净
[01:21.21]将痛苦的记忆忘得一干二净
[01:24.71]我拥有数百万美元
[01:28.16]从一开始 我就拥有一切
[01:31.52]那种玩意让我忘记烦恼
[01:35.39]以及我心底的创伤
[01:37.98]内心深处的阴暗面在呼唤我
[01:39.28]我的胸口伤痕累累 可我安然无恙
[01:40.98]我想念我的朋友 我讨厌聚光灯下的生活
[01:42.79]我深爱着我的女友 我讨厌朝三暮四
[01:44.55]黄色钻石 耀眼夺目的珍珠
[01:46.31]我想给她全世界
[01:47.99]我想带她领略这大千世界
[01:49.73]她不是平平无奇的女孩
[01:51.96]我知道她明白 我知道她明白我孤苦无助
[01:55.22]生活如同一片汪洋 难以摆脱的恶魔将我吞没
[01:58.77]我看着人群 强颜欢笑
[02:02.26]我要振作起来 重现往日神采
[02:06.35]排解忧愁 摆脱负能量
[02:09.83]排解忧愁 摆脱负能量
[02:13.31]将痛苦的记忆忘得一干二净
[02:16.81]将痛苦的记忆忘得一干二净
[02:20.32]排解忧愁 摆脱负能量
[02:23.69]排解忧愁 摆脱负能量
[02:27.16]将痛苦的记忆忘得一干二净
[02:30.89]将痛苦的记忆忘得一干二净
